channel.title: About #APConf2020
channel.description:
Add your proposals for the Conf by creating a New Topic – Tag it #bof for *Birds of Feather sessions* or #hackathon for *Hack proposals* …
A conference about the present and future of ActivityPub, the world’s leading federated social web standard. Follow **#APConf2020**
https://conf.activitypub.rocks
This category is to prepare, record, and archive the #APConf2020 virtual conference which happens over the Internet from October 2<sup>nd</sup> to 5<sup>th</sup>, 2020.
Please see the list of topics at [#meeting:apconf2020](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/c/meeting/apconf2020/53).
*Bandwidth limits:* Please note that the synchronous parts of the conference (including the video calls for the BoFs) will be available to registered participants only.
> "Let's keep things fun." -- @cwebber

item.title: About #APConf2020
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
Add your proposals for the Conf by creating a New Topic –
Tag it #bof for Birds of Feather sessions or #hackathon for Hack proposals …

A conference about the present and future of ActivityPub,
the world’s leading federated social web standard.
Follow #APConf2020

#apconf

ActivityPub Conference 2020 Virtual

A conference about the present and future of ActivityPub, the world’s leading federated social web standard. Presentations of prepared talks followed by a loosely structured unconference. #apconf

This category is to prepare, record, and archive the #APConf2020 virtual conference which happens over the Internet from October 2nd to 5th, 2020.

Please see the list of topics at #meeting:apconf2020.

Bandwidth limits:
Please note that the synchronous parts of the conference (including the video calls for the BoFs) will be available to registered participants only.

“Let’s keep things fun.” – @cwebber

Read full topic
